name: JBOperatorStore
description: Stores operator permissions for all addresses. Addresses can give permissions to any other address to take specific indexed actions on their behalf.

eventDecorators.name: SetOperator
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an ERC721 token is withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: hasPermission
functionDecorators.description: Whether or not an operator has the permission to take a certain action pertaining to the specified domain.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The account that has given out permissions to the operator.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain that the operator has been given permissions to operate.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The permission indexes to check for.

returnDecorators.description: Whether the operator has the specified permission.

functionDecorators.name: hasPermissions
functionDecorators.description: Whether or not an operator has the permission to take certain actions pertaining to the specified domain.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The account that has given out permissions to the operator.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: The domain that the operator has been given permissions to operate.

parameterDecorators.name: _permissionIndexes
parameterDecorators.description: An array of permission indexes to check for.

returnDecorators.description: Whether the operator has all specified permissions.

functionDecorators.name: permissionsOf
functionDecorators.description: The permissions that an operator has to operate on a specific domain.

functionDecorators.name: setOperator
functionDecorators.description: Sets permissions for an operators. Only an address can set its own operators._operatorData.operators The operators to whom permissions will be given._operatorData.domains Lists the domain that each operator is being given permissions to operate. A value of 0 serves as a wildcard domain. Applications can specify their own domain system._operatorData.permissionIndexes Lists the permission indexes to set for each operator. Indexes must be between 0-255. Applications can specify the significance of each index.

parameterDecorators.name: _operatorData
parameterDecorators.description: The data that specifies the params for the operator being set.

functionDecorators.name: setOperators
functionDecorators.description: Sets permissions for many operators. Only an address can set its own operators._operatorData.operators The operators to whom permissions will be given._operatorData.domains Lists the domain that each operator is being given permissions to operate. A value of 0 serves as a wildcard domain. Applications can specify their own domain system._operatorData.permissionIndexes Lists the permission indexes to set for each operator. Indexes must be between 0-255. Applications can specify the significance of each index.

parameterDecorators.name: _operatorData
parameterDecorators.description: The data that specifies the params for each operator being set.
